name: Boom Golf
description:
Boom Golf is a short time-based golf/puzzle game. Currently there are 10 levels, each meticulously designed to introduce new ideas and mechanics!

This was a 2 man job, with SFX handled by K.J. (or quait) and the development work by me.

WHY SUPPORT?

By supporting the game, you'll get access to a standalone build and will help support what we do, allowing us to make more games for free like this in the future. :)
